Title: Selection of Web-Based Framework for System Development using AHP (Analytic Hierarchy Process) Method in PT. XYZ
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Gunawan, A., School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: PT. XYZ is a distributor company with more than 20 branches in Indonesia that has been using the Windows platform to run its daily operations. Where is PT. XYZ wants to develop its system using web-based applications, where applications can run on all devices. System development is carried out using PHP based web applications. The PHP programming language has many frameworks. Most available frameworks are open source and have their advantages and disadvantages. Among the PHP frameworks that are widely used there are two very popular and frequently used frameworks, namely Laravel and CodeIgniter. Because both of these frameworks have an easier, neat system development process and their security is guaranteed. Based on these problems the researcher wants to choose what framework is most appropriate for PT. XYZ with AHP Method, Where the goal of researchers using the AHP method can decide which framework is most suitable for use. And the conclusion PT. XYZ is to use the Laravel framework © 2020 IEEE.
Index Keywords: Analytic hierarchy process; Information management; Open source software; Websites; AHP (analytic hierarchy process); Open sources; System development; System development process; WEB application; Web-based applications; Web-based framework; Windows platform; Hierarchical systems

Title: Implementation of Marketing Intelligence Systems for Operational Activities Using Business Intelligence in PT. XYZ
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Gunawan, A., School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: PT. XYZ is a vehicle automotive retail company that already has 26 branches spread across major cities and has more than 150 salesmen. The marketing positions consist of 5 levels, from salesman, supervisors, branch heads, area managers to marketing directors. One of the tasks of the marketing director is to set a five-level selling price level and determine the promotion of all products from PT. XYZ the number of customers from PT. XYZ currently is around 12, 500 consisting of wholesalers, shops, workshops, companies and factories. Competition in the automotive world is very tight. Field salesman who are already equipped with price strata and promotions sometimes have difficulty in the field where competitors can quickly change their selling prices, provide attractive discounts or promotions to existing customers. According to interviews with salesmen in the field, making decisions about prices, discounts and promotions takes an average of 2 to 3 days, so that the potential loss of orders and even loss of customers can occur at any time. and according to data obtained on average every salesman loses 3 to 5 orders every month, this is because the long chain of communication at PT. XYZ in addition to selling prices and promotions. Salesman must be responsive to the needs and complaints from customers. Therefore, we need a Marketing Intelligence System with Business Intelligence support to be able to support salesman operations in the field more efficiently and effectively. The research method used is to start with data collection by conducting interviews, design applications in accordance with the findings and results of the analysis and the final step is followed by the design of the data house and dashboard for marketing. © 2020 IEEE.
Index Keywords: Commerce; Costs; Information analysis; Information management; Automotive world; Data collection; Design applications; Making decision; Marketing intelligences; Operational activity; Potential loss; research methods; Sales

Title: Selection of open source database management for system development using analytic hierarchy process method in PT. XYZ
Source title: Proceedings of 2020 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2020
Affiliations: School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Gunawan, A., School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Information Systems Department, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: PT. XYZ is a manufacturing company with more than 26 branches in Indonesia that has been using the Windows platform to run its daily operations. Where is PT. XYZ wants to develop its system using web-based applications, where applications can run on all devices. System development is carried out using PHP based web applications. Besides wanting to develop web-base applications for its daily operational needs, PT. XYZ must also choose an open source database as a companion to the web-base application where the database must be able to be seen from factors such as storage, especially supporting big data, data security, support with web-base applications, database server capabilities, availability of updates, easy to maintain, back up features and can be developed. The most popular dan best open source database right now is PostgreSQL and MariaDB. IT can define strategy alternatives before determining database software to be used more effectively and efficiently. Based on these problems the researcher wants to choose what framework is most appropriate for PT. XYZ with AHP Method, Where the goal of researchers using the AHP method can decide which Open Source Database Management is most suitable for use. And the conclusion PT. XYZ is to use the MariaDB. the next stage of research is the selection of ERP development methods © 2020 IEEE.

Title: Knowledge Management to Increase the Human Resource Quality Case Study at PT. GAI
Source title: Proceedings of 2019 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2019
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Gunawan, A., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Kurnia, S.G., Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The application of Knowledge Management System has been widely used throughout the world both for government and private companies ranging from small scale to enterprise scale. The application of Knowledge Management is also widely used to improve the quality of human resources. Especially for the type of industry that requires high HR capabilities where the individual capabilities of its HR are very influential to the results of the quality of its products. The purpose of this study is to provide a solution to the problems faced by PT. GAI, especially in the production section where the knowledge and ability of cutting, installation, repair of window film on the car are not evenly distributed in all existing HR, including the absorption of knowledge on new types of cars. The method used is Knowledge Spiral Model (SECI Model) from Nonaka and Takeuchi where there are 4 stages of the process, namely socialization, externalization, combination and internalization are needed PT. GAI for enhancing their HR capability. The results of the analysis show that PT GAI is a company that is rich in knowledge, but less well-organized need to build KM application to enables organization sustainability and strengthening their organizational human resources. Therefore, it is necessary to have a good Knowledge Management System to enable organization learning, where all employees can share and put their knowledge and look for what they want in the system. This study aims to identify the application of Knowledge Management carried out by industrial companies that require high HR capabilities. This can be done if you want to apply knowledge management more broadly. Certainly, it will provide greater benefits to the world of industry in the future. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: HR; knowledge; knowledge management; quality improvement
Index Keywords: Human resource management; Knowledge acquisition; Knowledge based systems; Industrial companies; knowledge; Knowledge management system; Organization learning; Private companies; Quality improvement; Spiral models; Window film; Knowledge management

Title: Knowledge Management Study in Data Warehouse
Source title: Proceedings of 2018 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2018
Affiliations: Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Gunawan, A., Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Kurnia, S.G., Information Systems Department, Bina Nusantara University, School of Information Systems, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The implementation of Knowledge Management in Organization is a must for any organizations in Globalizationera. The Knowledege Management combined with InformationTechnology is a key success factor for sustainable organization. The Information in Knowledge Management should be readyand easy to access from anywhere and anytime. The problem ininformation is the data is too much, and spread out anywhere inmany formats. In this condition, the user may not find theinformation or wasting time to search the correct informationaccording to their needs. The Knowledge Management System isdeveloped to answer the needs to find the data with efficient, reliable, and trust. The Knowledge management keeps the datasystematically, and easy to find based on several indicatordetermined by user. The saved information is available to alllevel in organization, from operational, tactical to strategic levelaccording to their position. The success of Knowledgemanagement is depend on the information technology. Thetechnology should be suitable with the system and support interms of scalability, security and mobility. The technology willcreate the Knowledge Repository, to enable data and informationis kept secure. The Knowledge Repository operation andmaintainance is designed with the concept of Data Warehouse. The knowledge will grow each time and the structure will growalong the grow of data. In this research, the model is PTAutochem Industry, the retail organization of HealthCare. Theorganization has 24 branches in Major Cities in Indonesia. Theproblem arise when 150 marketers need to handle more than 100products. The marketing has some difficulties in understood 100products with their uniqueness, and the strategy of marketing inhealthcare product. By using Knowledge Management, marketing can more efficient and productive in handling marketfor healthcare produ. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: data warehouse; knowledge management; knowledge repository

Title: Improving organizational knowledge management (KM) through cloud based platform in higher education
Source title: Proceedings of 2017 International Conference on Information Management and Technology, ICIMTech 2017
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, Binus Graduate Program-Master of Information Systems Management, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Management Department, BINUS Business School-Binus, Undergraduate Program, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Management Department, BINUS Online Learning, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Information Systems Department, School of Information Systems, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia

Abstract: An organization knowledge management (KM) portal is essential to provide adequate knowledge to simplify and improve the process of work to be more effective in the organization. The article applies online KM portal to cover major functions of the university, with using cloud paradigm. The reason for the investigation is to break down how the cloud based association learning entrance empowers to enhance the execution of college staffs all the more successfully. Effective organization KM portal should contain all necessary knowledge that enable to enrich and to assist the staffs in each department enable to carry their task effectively. The objective of the study is to assist the university knowledge architect to develop an effective knowledge strategy that enables to promote effective work and better distribution of knowledge. © 2017 IEEE.

Authors: Kurniawan Y., Gunawan A., Gregorius Kurnia S.
Title: Application of business intelligence to support marketing strategies: A case study approach
Source title: Journal of Theoretical and Applied Information Technology
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Department of Information Systems, Jakarta-11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Kurniawan, Y., Bina Nusantara University, Department of Information Systems, Jakarta-11480, Indonesia; Gunawan, A., Bina Nusantara University, Department of Information Systems, Jakarta-11480, Indonesia; Gregorius Kurnia, S., Bina Nusantara University, Department of Information Systems, Jakarta-11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This paper discusses the business intelligence and its role to improve the company's competitive advantage through the utilization of various data, information and knowledge held by the company as a raw material in the decision making process. The tight of market competition and its changes has forced the marketers to apply an appropriate strategy in order to survive and to follow the market changes and even to come out as a market leader. The implementation of this business intelligence should be based on the understanding of basic concept of marketing, the focus on customer's need, the sense of market changing, and also the support of all components in the company. © 2005 - 2014 JATIT & LLS. All rights reserved.
